subject: Re: Hello Simsonn,
description_text:
Hello, how are you doing? I know you may be busy, but I also know your
focus is on getting results. Let’s make this simple so I can start working
and help your efforts pay off even more. How do you plan to move forward?

If possible, kindly share your WhatsApp number so we can communicate more
easily. And in case it’s easier for you, here’s mine: [
https://wa.me/message/4PAWOOQOSBJAB1].

On Thu, 31 Jul 2025, 4:05 am Yusuf Oluwanishola, <sholypro52@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Are you aware that your website currently doesn't appear on the first 1 to
> 30 pages of Google search engine results page ( GSERP) when people are
> actively searching for your niche?
>
> On Fri, 16 May 2025, 6:59 pm Sholy Pro, <sholypro52@gmail.com> wrote:
>
>> Hi it's amazing day ?, I know It’s not right to ignore someone’s
>> messages without explanation. We’re both human, and I believe we deserve
>> mutual respect. I’ve been curious why you don’t reply, especially since
>> there’s been no issue between us. It feels like a disregard for feelings
>> and respect, which I find unfair. Please let me know what’s going on, as
>> clear communication is important?
>>
>> On Thu, 17 Apr 2025, 9:10 am Sholy Pro, <sholypro52@gmail.com> wrote:
>>
>>> It’s been a while, hope you’ve been doing great! I took a moment today
>>> to check in and spotted a critical issue on your store.
>>>
>>> Customers are being redirected during checkout, a strong sign of hidden
>>> malware. This puts your customer data at risk, violates platform policies,
>>> and can seriously damage your brand.
>>>
>>> With 30%+ of eCommerce breaches caused by malware, time is of the
>>> essence.
>>>
>>> Are you ready to resolve this issue and also do you know how to fix it ?
>>>
>>> On Fri, 11 Apr 2025, 9:37 am Sholy Pro, <sholypro52@gmail.com> wrote:
>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>> I’ve been thinking about our last conversation and the potential your
>>>> store holds honestly, it's the kind of project I’m excited to take on. I
>>>> can already see the key areas where we can implement smart changes to drive
>>>> big results.
>>>>
>>>> Since then, I’ve worked with a few other store owners in similar
>>>> situations with lots of traffic but low conversions. We streamlined their
>>>> store design, improved the user flow, added urgency triggers, and in just a
>>>> few weeks, one of them saw a 65% boost in orders.
>>>>
>>>> To give you a clearer picture of what’s achievable, I’ve attached two
>>>> store links
>>>>
>>>> 1, https://bejulzbeautysupply.com/
>>>> 2, https://rebelssoulcosmetics.com/
>>>>
>>>> and images of their current sales performance. These are stores I
>>>> worked on recently, and the results speak for themselves. This should give
>>>> you confidence in what we can build for you too.
>>>>
>>>> I’ve also reviewed your store’s current performance, and with just a
>>>> few strategic changes, I believe we can dramatically improve not just your
>>>> revenue, but also the overall customer experience and brand reputation.
>>>>
>>>> If you’re available anytime today, we can also hop on a quick Google
>>>> Meet to walk through everything in detail and make sure we're aligned on
>>>> how to move forward with this implementation. I believe a short
>>>> conversation could really help us understand each other better and speed
>>>> things up.
>>>>
>>>> No pressure or sales pitch I’d be happy to share a simple,
>>>> no-strings-attached roadmap that outlines how we can close the gaps and
>>>> start scaling.
>>>>
>>>> If you're still interested (and I truly hope you are), just reply with:
>>>> "I’m in what’s the next step?"
>>>> Or let me know a time that works for the Google Meet I’ll send over a
>>>> link.
>>>>
>>>> Looking forward to helping you win big.
>>>>
>>>> Warm regards,
>>>> Sholy
>>>>
>>>>
>>>> On Tue, 8 Apr 2025, 3:23 am Sholy Pro, <sholypro52@gmail.com> wrote:
>>>>
>>>>> Hello Simsonn,
>>>>>
>>>>> It’s nice to connect with you. I hope this email reach the store
>>>>> owner. I know this avenue is for enquiry. However, I've noticed certain
>>>>> valuable areas in your business that seem to have been neglected, limiting
>>>>> its potential, which prompt me to ask my question about your inbox been
>>>>> active for inquiries about your website, I believe I can share some
>>>>> valuable ideas, but I'm uncomfortable doing so without your permission.
>>>>>
>>>>> So can I have your permission to share my observations?
>>>>>
>>>>> Best Regards,
>>>>> Sholy
>>>>>
>>>>> On Tue, 8 Apr 2025, 3:08 am General and sales enquiries, <
>>>>> service@simsonn.com> wrote:
>>>>>
>>>>>> Hi, what can i help you?
>>>>>> ------------------------------
>>>>>> service@simsonn.com
>>>>>>
>>>>>>
>>>>>> *From:* Sholy Pro <sholypro52@gmail.com>
>>>>>> *Date:* 2025-04-08 09:43
>>>>>> *To:* service <service@simsonn.com>
>>>>>> *Subject:* Hello Simsonn,
>>>>>> Is this inbox  available for enquiry about your website?
>>>>>>
>>>>>>
